mapper.select: select bset_address from np_sys_basicset where bset_id = 1

select i.goods_info_id,i.goods_info_name,i.goods_info_item_no,o.count from np_goods_info i left join (select sum(goods_info_num) as count, np_order_goods.goods_info_id from np_order_goods where order_id in (select order_id from np_order where order_status='3')group by goods_info_id) o on o.goods_info_id=i.goods_info_id where i.goods_info_delflag='0' and i.goods_info_added='1' and i.third_id=#{thirdId} group by i.goods_info_id order by o.count desc limit 0,5
